questions.question: The first time James drove a car was only last week. // James ________ last week.

choices.answer: did never drive a car before
has never driven a car until
had never driven a car before

questions.question: He was so impressed by Ella that she was offered the job / Ella ___ that he offered her the job

choices.answer: gave such a good impression on him
had such a good impression for him
made such a good impression on him

questions.question: Liz & Greg couldn't afford to buy a flat, so they rented one until they could. / Liz & Greg ___

choices.answer: had been renting their flat before they could buy one.
have been renting their flat before they could buy one.
were renting their flat before they could buy one.

questions.question: He came to my home with no warning. / I wish ____ he was coming to my home.

choices.answer: he told me
he had told me
he would tell me

questions.question: I asked for my money back, but they refused unless I had a receipt. / Without a receipt, I ___

choices.answer: was unable to get a refund.
was able to get a refund.
would be able to get a refund
could get a receipt.

questions.question: WaterLink were confident they would get the contract. / WaterLink felt they ____

choices.answer: were bound to be awarded the contract
may be awarded the contract
might totally be awarded the contract

questions.question: I don't think you'll have any difficulty finding us if you use your GPS. / You ___ use your GPS

choices.answer: can't easily find us if you
have a chance to find us if you
should easily find us if you

questions.question: There's a strong possibility  that we'll have to cancel the lesson. / The lesson___.

choices.answer: is bound to be cancelled
may well be cancelled
should strongly be cancelled

questions.question: It is unlikely that I will meet the deadline. / There is ____ the deadline.

choices.answer: little likelihood that I meet
low likelihood that I will meet
little likelihood of me meeting
low likelihood of I meet

questions.question: Can I talk to you after lunch? / _____ a chat after lunch?

choices.answer: Is there any chance to have
Is there any chance of having
Is there any opportunity of having
